name: Care
title: Care FHIR Implementation Guide
description: FHIR Implementation Guide for Care - a Digital Public Good enabling Decentralized Administration of Healthcare. This IG documents all Care EMR models as FHIR R5 resources, profiles, and extensions.

grouping.name: Administration
grouping.description: Foundational administrative resources: Patient, Related Person, User, User Roles, Permissions, Consent, Facility, Department, Location, Care Team, Device

grouping.name: Definitions
grouping.description: Definitional resources: Questionnaire, Observation Definition, Specimen Definition, Device Definition, ValueSet, Code System, Plan Definition, Activity Definition

grouping.name: Clinical
grouping.description: Clinical resources: Encounters, Allergy Intolerance, Immunization, Risk Assessment, Procedure, Questionnaire Response, Observation, Condition, Care Plan, Goal, DocumentReference, Medication Request, Medication Statement, Medication Administration, Task, Threads, Messages

grouping.name: Scheduling
grouping.description: Scheduling resources: Schedule, Token Slot, Token Booking, Availability, Availability Exception

grouping.name: Pharmacy and Inventory
grouping.description: Pharmacy and inventory resources: Medication Dispense, Inventory Item, InventoryReport, Transport, Device Dispense, Supply Request, SupplyDelivery

grouping.name: Labs and Diagnostics
grouping.description: Laboratory and diagnostic resources: Service Request, Specimen, Media, Diagnostic Report, Imaging Study

grouping.name: Billing and Accounting
grouping.description: Financial resources: Charge Item, Charge Item Definition, Invoice, Account, Payment Notice, Payment Reconciliation, Claim, ClaimResponse, Coverage, Explanation Of Benefit
